name: Bit-Side
description:
Bit-Side is an adventure/puzzle videogame designed to be played in short sessions, just like old handheld games! You control Flippy, a specimen attempting to escape from a laboratory filled with hazards and dangerous creatures. Flippy's ability is rather peculiar; it's called bit-siding! It allows him to wrap around the screen and access locked rooms! Use this power to make your way up the floors of the Laboratory. 

WASD/arrow keys to move.

Alt/Z/J to press "A".

Ctrl/K/X to press "B".

Enter to press "Start".

Shift to press "Select."

This game was created using GB Studio, a free open-source development tool.

Voice in the demo trailer: https://www.castingcall.club/M_Sheep
